abstract: Julianne Escobedo Shepherd, culture editor at Jezebel, Jon Caramanica and Ben Ratliff of the Times discuss the ceiling of success in bachata, various ideals of international and multilingual pop, opportunities versus opportunism, and the romantic versus the global.

headline.main: Popcast: Prince Royce, Pitbull and Multilingual Pop Music
